Package stemmer

Class Summary
SnowballStemmer Title: SnowballStemmer.java
Description: This class is a wrapper for the Snowball stemmers (see http://snowball.tartarus.org/) for
  • Danish,
  • Dutch,
  • English,
  • Finnish,
  • French,
  • German,
  • Italian,
  • Norwegian,
  • Portuguese,
  • Russian,
  • Spanish,
  • Swedish. The Stemmer process already created annotations containing string feature, as these created by the Tokeniser.
    		•
